price: 81. Nous fîmes soudain se fendre la terre sous lui. Lui et sa demeure y furent engloutis. Il n’y eut alors, en dehors d’Allah, aucun clan pour le secourir, et il ne put lui-même se secourir.
arabic: فَخَسَفۡنَا بِهِۦ وَبِدَارِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ مِن فِئَةٖ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fakhasafnā bihi wabidārihi al-arḍa famā kāna lahu min fi-atin yanṣurūnahu min dūni al-lahi wamā kāna mina al-muntaṣirīna
translations: Then We caused to swallow up
